Sequence Information.Peptide Name: FK-13 F17S analog (Gorilla LL-37(17-29), Gorilla LL37(17-29), Synthetic AMPs, UCLL1c)
Sequence Information.Source: amino acid substitution, human cathelicidin analog, animal-derived, natural derivative

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (92.31%) toFK-13Activity: active against M. luteus (MIC 53 uM) relative to the WT with an MIC of 22 uM. Warning: other bacteria not tested.Structure: the structure is highly symmetrical!You can rotate, zoom, and view the structureherein the PDB.Updated 12/2024
Literature Information.Author: Engelberg Y, Landau M. 2020
Literature Information.Title: The Human LL-37(17-29) antimicrobial peptide reveals a functional supramolecular structure.
